useCases.title: AI-Powered Boolean Search Generation
useCases.description: Transform your candidate sourcing with AI-generated Boolean search strings that find better candidates faster.
prerequisites: Access to LinkedIn Recruiter or similar platform

gettingStarted.title: Prepare your input
gettingStarted.description: Gather job title, required skills, and experience level

gettingStarted.title: Test & refine
gettingStarted.description: Run search on your platform and adjust based on results

commonPitfalls.title: Over-complexity
commonPitfalls.description: Don't add too many OR conditions - keep searches focused

commonPitfalls.title: Platform differences
commonPitfalls.description: Boolean syntax varies between LinkedIn, Indeed, etc.

realExample.input: Senior Java Developer with microservices experience
realExample.output: (Java OR "Java Developer") AND (Senior OR "Sr." OR Lead) AND (microservices OR "micro services" OR "service oriented") AND -junior -intern
